0.name: welcome
0.content: Welcome to Invisible API! This is our internal bot, and serves as both our demo and information center. To get started, what is your name?
0.error_message: Sorry, please try a different message

1.name: email
1.content: Hello, %s! Thank you for your interest in Invisible! Which email address do you prefer to be contacted at?
1.error_message: Please enter a valid email like 'kendall@invisibleapi.com'.

2.name: company
2.content: Fantastic! What is the name of your company?

3.name: url
3.content: Good good! Does your company have a website or facebook page? If not, that's ok!
3.error_message: Please enter a valid url like 'http://www.invisibleapi.com'.

4.name: intent
4.content: Last question, how would you like to use Invisible API?
4.error_message: Please tell us a bit more.

5.name: thanks
5.content: Great! Thank you %s! Someone from our team will be in contact shortly. For more information about Invisible API, please visit our website: http://www.invisibleapi.com. Have a great day!
5.error_message: That's all for now. We look forward to learning more about your business!
